basics.name: Matthias Rebel
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a passionate software developer with a unique combination of deep technical knowledge and a broad, strategic perspective. My foundation in computational linguistics enables me to seamlessly integrate human language technologies, machine learning, and AI, unlocking new dimensions of product functionality and user engagement.

With a strong commitment to continuous improvement, I excel at exploring complex topics in depth while maintaining a clear focus on the broader picture. Balancing specialization with generalist capabilities, I consistently deliver innovative, high-impact solutions aligned with business objectives.

As a proactive learner and problem solver, I adopt an open-minded approach, emphasizing knowledge transfer and empathy to craft effective, impactful solutions. By aligning business needs with smart technology choices, and leveraging agile practices and automation, I drive efficient, fast-paced development cycles supported by continuous feedback and a focus on delivering real-world value.

work.name: Universum AG
highlights: Designed and implemented an AI-powered tool integrating chatbot capabilities with automated email responses, leveraging company's knowledge base and ChatGPT (Docker, Python, FastAPI, OpenAI, Redis, JavaScript, Vue.js, GitLab CI).
Engineered APIs for Belenios secure cryptographic online voting system integration, supporting 60,000 users and processing 600 votes/30 seconds (Python, FastAPI).
Built and maintained content pool aggregating news and events data for app integration (Python, Elasticsearch).
Developed custom Drupal module with AI-driven NLP-enhanced search functionality (PHP, Python, Watson, spaCy, Elasticsearch).
Optimized Git collaboration workflows and enhanced deployment pipelines (Git, GitLab, Make, Ansible).
Organized and hosted Drupal Meetup Group event fostering community engagement.

work.name: Retresco GmbH
highlights: Developed stream processing pipeline and personalization algorithm for real-time content delivery (Python, Flask, Kafka, Elasticsearch).
Provided technical consultancy guiding architecture decisions and best practices.
Refactored monolithic applications into microservices with containerization and CI/CD pipelines.
Designed and implemented GUI for TMS with frontend-backend integration (AngularJS, Tornado, Elasticsearch).
Developed relation extraction system for short message analysis.

work.name: DFKI GmbH
highlights: Developed multilingual mobile dialogue assistant (PHP, Objective‑C).
Designed classification algorithm for question‑answer pair detection.
Enhanced user interaction and dialogue structures for diploma thesis project.

work.name: Universität Potsdam
highlights: Converted Word documents to XML for eXist‑db (Python, Tomcat).
Developed data retrieval interface for project website (Python).
Built CMS for personal staff websites (Python).

work.name: Pfefferwerk gGmbH
highlights: Conducted lectures on computer interaction for children.
Delivered training in Photoshop and digital drawing for trainees.

courses: Optimierung der Dialogstrukturen einer bilingualen elektronischen Kommunikationshilfe
Computer Assistance in Bilingual Task-Oriented Human-Human Dialogues (HCII‑2011)

certificates.name: Ultimate AWS Certified Developer Associate 2025 DVA-C02
